articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes UNSC's "Presidential Statement"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes UNSC's "Presidential Statement"
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a recent statement vehemently refuted the UNSC's "presidential statement" condemning the DPRK's satellite launch. It clarified its resolute political decision that it would never participate in the six-party talks but bolster its nuclear deterrent for self-defence in every way.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The decision made by the DPRK is the most just and timely independent countermeasure to cope with the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 The UNSC brought the issue of the DPRK's satellite launch up for discussion and condemned it, dancing to the tune of the U.S. and its followers. This was an unpardonable rash act quite contrary to the principles of sovereign equality and impartiality, ground for the existence and activities of the UN, and outer space treaty.
					
					 The UNSC, defying the principles of sovereign equality and impartiality, tabled and discussed the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes although it was legitimately conducted after going through procedures under international law. This was an intolerable mockery of the Korean people and extremely hostile acts against the DPRK which can never be pardoned.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the action taken by the UNSC was the height of partiality, double-standards and arbitrary practices.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The spirit of respect for sovereignty and sovereign equality stipulated in the September 19 joint statement for denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula serves as the basis and the life and soul of the six-party talks.  The DPRK was quite just when it declared that it will never participate in the six-party talks which are reduced to a platform for encroaching upon its sovereignty and forcing it to disarm itself and bringing down its system.
					
					 The military threat escalated by the hostile forces, taking issue with and challenging even the satellite launch for peaceful purposes, compels the DPRK to further increase its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, guarantee for the protection of the country's sovereignty, right to existence and supreme interests.
					
					 The day will surely come when those resorting to partiality, double-standards and arbitrary practices meet punishment of the history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on April 19 Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on April 19 Popular Uprising
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed article with the lapse of 49 years since the April 19 Popular Uprising in south Korea.
					 The April 19 Popular Uprising was not only the eruption of the south Koreans' pent-up anger against the cruel policy of colonial domination of the U.S. imperialists and the harsh fascist rule of their followers but a popular resistance against the U.S. and fascism for bringing about a new world, independent and democratic. 
					
					 The uprising clearly proved that nothing can dampen the heroic stamina and indomitable will of the popular masses and that if the south Koreans rise up united as one, they can surely beat any ferocious despot and win a victory, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is nearly half a century since the heroic April 19 Popular Uprising. However the south Koreans' desire for independence, democracy and reunification has not yet come true.
					
					 Struggle staged by south Koreans from all walks of life has faced grave challenge due to the conservative ruling forces' wicked moves. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, which came to power crying out for the "lost decade", has put outside forces above the nation. It sold off the dignity and interests of the nation lock, stock and barrel, while begging its master U.S. to keep the aggressor troops in south Korea for an indefinite period and tighten "alliance" with it.
					
					 The reckless action taken by the Lee Myung Bak regime against the country's reunification completely destroyed the foundation of the inter-Korean relations and rendered the situation prevailing in the Korean Peninsula so grave that a nuclear war may break out there any moment. 
					
					 After the appearance of the above-said regime south Korea is going back to the dark era of fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 The mechanism and system of fascist oppression were fully restored and the freedom of speech has been crudely violated. 
					
					 Without do-or-die struggle the south Koreans can neither retake the sovereignty and democratic rights which were trampled down nor do away with their old misery and disgrace. 
					
					 All the fellow countrymen at home and abroad should wage unflinching struggle to resolutely reject the anti-reunification "policy toward the north" pursued by the Lee group and implement the historic north-south joint declarations, united firmly under the banner of "By our nation itself" and thus bring earlier the independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 If all the patriotic people who value justice and aspire after the reunification of the country pool their will and efforts, irrespective of ideology, ism and the partisan interests and strategy, and firmly unite there will be nothing impossible.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Move for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Move for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flayed 
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- 13 political parties and organizations of south Korea including the Democratic Labor Party, the Solidarity for Progress, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification called a joint news conference outside the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade on April 15 denouncing the puppet authorities' move for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 The press release read out at the press conference accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of scheming to fully participate in the U.S.-led PSI after the DPRK's launch of satellite.
					
					 The authorities' above-mentioned move is a dangerous act little short of driving the south-north relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe as it precisely means a declaration that it will take an official part in the U.S.-led campaign to impose blockade against the DPRK, the press release noted.
					
					 Strongly condemning the authorities' said action utterly indifferent to the national interests, it urged the Lee "government" to halt the action though belatedly.
					
					 If the Lee "government" persists in its stand obsessed with worship and sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation between the south and the north, it will meet strong resistance of the people, the press released pointed out, warning that it will be held fully responsible for the consequences to be entailed by its action.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, members of the political parties and organizations launched a sit-in strike.

articles.title: Accusation against DPRK's Satellite Launch Rejected
articles.content:
Accusation against DPRK's Satellite Launch Rejected
 Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The academic headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on April 13 to denounce the U.S. and its followers for their accusation against the DPRK's satellite launch.
					 The statement said: The U.S. and Japan are slandering the DPRK's earth satellite as "missile for military purposes." Such moves can not be construed otherwise than an intention to apply sanctions on the DPRK and turn the international community into a theatre of violence.
					
					 Besides, the Lee Myung Bak "government" chimes in with the moves, asserting that it would fully participate in the U.S.-led missile defence system and PSI, the statement charged.
					
					 To use outer space for peaceful purposes is a legitimate and equal right of all countries, the statement pointed out, urging the U.S., Japan and the Lee Myung Bak "government" to stop calling for sanctions against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: Struggle for Judging Lee Myung Bak Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Judging Lee Myung Bak Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century called a press conference in Seoul on April 14 at which it declared that the students throughout south Korea under the federation would escalate the drive to judge traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 The declaration read out at the conference noted that all the university students would turn out in the large-scale "national university students action" to be staged on May 1, adding that the struggle would be the one for not only the settlement of the problems of the tuition and the youth unemployment but judging the Lee "government".
					
					 To do so the organization will visit all the universities of south Korea to conduct information service, clarified the declaration.

articles.title: Scheme for "Sanctions" against DPRK Rejected
articles.content:
Scheme for "Sanctions" against DPRK Rejected
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Sweden released a statement "We reject any attempted sanctions against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on April 6, supporting the DPRK's satellite launch and condemning the U.S. and its followers for their anti-DPRK moves.
					 Recalling that the DPRK succeeded in putting its experimental communications satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 into orbit by means of carrier rocket Unha-2, the statement said this shows that the DPRK's science and technology for peaceful use of outer space have reached the high level.
					
					 However, the U.S., Japan and south Korea defined the DPRK's launch of satellite as "launch of long-range missile" from the outset and are scheming to apply international "sanctions" against the DPRK, it charged.
					
					 Such moves are quite contrary to "the spirit of mutual respect and equality" stipulated in the September 19 joint statement for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, and they will only aggravate the situation in the peninsula and Northeast Asia, it warned.
					
					 The statement said that the Communist Party of Sweden rejects absurd "sanctions" attempted by the forces hostile to the DPRK, reminding that to use outer space for peaceful purposes is the legitimate right of all sovereign states.
					
					 It held that the U.S., Japan and south Korea have no right to interfere in the DPRK's plan for space development and the UNSC, too, has no authority to do so.

articles.title: Meeting Held in Sweden to Commemorate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Meeting Held in Sweden to Commemorate Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting of communist parties and friendship organizations in Nordic countries was held in Sweden on April 4 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were works of the peerlessly great persons and pictures showing their exploits.
					
					The participants in the meeting laid bunches of flowers before the photograph of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing together and paid homage to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden said that Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, is a great man who performed immortal feats not only for the Korean revolution but also for the human cause of independence, adding that all the progressive people of the world are remembering the great life of the President in humble reverence on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The international secretary of the above-said party in his speech condemned the U.S. imperialists and the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean clique of traitors following them for intensifying accusations against the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch and even crying out for the "UN sanctions".
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the DPRK built the capability to launch earth satellite despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it and the economic difficulties. This proves the validity and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, fathered by Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The message said it is one of the great feats performed by the President in his lifetime that he prevented a war on the Korean Peninsula and defended the world peace and ushered in the new era of the national liberation struggle in colonial countries.
					
					 The political parties and the organizations for friendship with the Korean people in northern Europe will as ever express invariable support and solidarity with the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent peaceful reunification of the country, it said.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages visited the DPRK embassies in their countries between April 14 and 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were the president and members of Russia's Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill", the minister of Information and Communications of Nepal, the chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, the president of the National Press Club of Nepal, the chairman of the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, the minister of Transport of Malaysia, the president of the Malaysian People's Movement, the representative of the youth organization of the Malaysian Chinese Association and presidents and directors of companies of Malaysia.
					
					They laid floral baskets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the full-length portrait of them standing together at the embassies and made deep bows to them.

articles.title: Respects to Kim Il Sung Paid in Various Countries
articles.content:
Respects to Kim Il Sung Paid in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Ministries, political parties and organizations, institutions and personages of different countries sent baskets of flowers to the DPRK embassies in their countries on April 13 and 14 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were the Ministry of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics, the Proletarian and Islamic Revolutionary Wounded Organization, the Workers' House and the Table-Tennis Federation of Iran, the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and the vice-president of Syria, the directors of organizational and security departments of the Regional Leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the defence minister, the vice-chairman of the National Progressive Front, the chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces, the president of the Trade Unions Federation and the chairman of the General Union of Peasants of Syria.
					
					 In the meantime, the "International Kim Il Sung Foundation" and companies in Hong Kong of China, including the Golden Trip Travel Service Ltd., sent floral baskets to the DPRK consulate general in Hong Kong on April 14.

articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Mongolia, Bangladesh, Romania and Pakistan between April 7 and 11 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 77th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venues of the photo exhibitions were pictures showing the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Il Sung and       Kim Jong Il and introducing the invincible might of the KPA.
					
					 E. Maksim, executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, in a report at the seminar elaborated on the fact that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea and built people-centered socialism in the country and the KPA has developed into an army strong in ideology and faith and an invincible army fully equipped with modern military technology under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The adviser and the secretary general of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and other speakers noted that the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung is successfully being carried forward and accomplished by Kim Jong Il, and expressed belief that the Korean people would smash the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of the President.
					
					 Victor Voichita, honorary chairman of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman is a great fortune of the Korean people.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, and the secretary of the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said that the undying Songun exploits of the President are shining more brilliantly thanks to the Songun policy of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films dealing with the Songun leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons.

articles.title: Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon
articles.content:
Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends for the development of the democratic national education of the children of the Korean residents in Japan on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) sent a message of thanks to Kim Jong Il for it on April 17.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 It is only the Korean residents in Japan who enjoy the honor and happiness of receiving so precious money for the education of their children generation after generation, though there are many overseas citizens in many countries of the world. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il is, indeed, a kind teacher and tender-hearted father who has shown all loving care and benevolence for the Korean residents and school youth and children in Japan and led them to victory, holding them all in his broad embrace. 
					
					 The officials of Chongryon and the Koreans residents in Japan who again received the great loving care and benevolence from Kim Jong Il are full of firm resolution to achieve a great success in the implementation of their patriotic tasks, ardently revering and following Kim Jong Il held at the top post of the DPRK, their genuine homeland.
					
					 Chongryon will share the same mind and the same breath with the people in homeland all out in a fresh general march forward true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il and make this year a year of decisive turn in laying a granite foundation for ushering in the heyday of the movement of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan.  
					
					 We will ardently love the socialist homeland of Juche and firmly protect it and make an honorable contribution to the nation-wide cause of prosperity and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Improvement of DPRK-Japan Relations Demanded in Japan
articles.content:
Improvement of DPRK-Japan Relations Demanded in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting of people in Hyogo Prefecture thinking of Japan-DPRK relations was held in Japan on April 7 in demand of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries through dialogue.
					  Attending it were personages of the Hyogo Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship, citizens from all walks of life and officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 A lecture under the subject of "Progress of the DPRK-U.S. relations and prospect of normalization of Japan-DPRK diplomatic relations" was given and then speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The lecturer and speakers contended that the DPRK's satellite launch is not problematic under international laws, and unveiled the sinister intention of the Japanese government clamoring about the "theory of threat from the DPRK" while kicking up a frantic racket of "interception" with mobilization of regional autonomies.
					
					 They slashed at the Japanese government's reckless moves to further tighten the sanctions on the DPRK and strongly urged the government to stop cracking down on the Korean residents in Japan and violating their rights at once.
					
					 They called upon the participants in the meeting to wage a more vigorous movement for establishing the Japan-DPRK diplomatic relations.
